JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: PPC-specialist søges til vækst virksomhed beliggende på Malta
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
We are looking for a talented and passionate Paid Search Executive to join our growing central acquisition team.

Reporting into PPC Manager, the Paid Search Executive will focus on online lead generation activities, including Google & Bing paid search campaigns’ set up and optimisation.

So if you are passionate about online marketing, have a ‘can do’ attitude and are a creative thinker, this role could be just for you!

Despite Malta’s small geographical size, the island offers lots of events and thing to do. In the summer, the island is among one of Europeans’ favorite destinations, as there is ample of opportunities for diving, snorkeling or other water sports during the daytime. You can spend your afternoon in Valletta’s narrow cobbled streets or at one of the temple’s beautiful historic monuments. In the evening, cocktails can be enjoyed with culinary delights from all over the world.

Malta is an old English colony and the spoken language on the island is English and Maltese. Therefore you will also be quick to notice that you drive on the left side, and eggs and bacon are the standard breakfast.

What will your day to day look like?

  • Manage all of the Danish markets paid search accounts
  • Identify new opportunities for paid acquisition
  • Create compelling ad copy and test landing pages for conversion
  • Conduct keyword research
  • Analyse the success of campaigns and running Youtube campaigns
  • Responsible for constant account optimisation
  • Produce regular internal reports on paid search activities
  • Work Google to develop conversion strategies
  • Daily monitor budget and CPAs

Requirements

What's your background?

  • 1-2 years experience in paid search advertising
  • Excellent understanding of digital marketing concepts and best practices
  • Proactive ‘can do’ attitude to your work and high level of initiative
  • Excellent attention to detail with an ability to work effectively according to deadlines
  • Analytical and data-focused, with an understanding of Google Analytics and other reporting platforms
  • Fluent to native level in Danish, and if you speak Swedish this would be considered a great plus!
  • Excellent verbal and written communication skills

Here is the team in Malta you will be working alongside:

 

Benefits

We put a lot of trust in every individual, we know that if we get the tools and space to do what we do best, we will be both happy and deliver great things. This is why we have some of the greatest minds in the industry working here.

Working hard also means that we need to be able to recharge our batteries once in a while, this is the reason why we want our office atmosphere to be relaxed and cosy, come by and challenge us in a game of ping pong or Fifa and if you're not into that, a studio session at the local gym or a cold drink from the fridge on a Friday late afternoon might be your type of melody.
